tag.description: Tag for Quarkus SecurityIdentity role-based access control.

attribute.description: Allows content to be rendered if the user has the role specified here.
attribute.name: role

attribute.description: Allows content to be rendered if the user has any of the comma-separated roles added here.
attribute.name: anyRole

attribute.description: Allows content to be rendered if the user has all of the comma-separated roles added here.
attribute.name: allRoles

attribute.description: Name for a view variable that will contain the result of the role evaluation. This variable can be used in EL instead of repeating the role evaluation multiple times.
attribute.name: var

tag.description: Allows content to be rendered if the user is anonymous.
Allows content to be rendered if the user is authenticated.
